content.raw:
This is a bit separate from this PR, but in testing I noticed that our light buoy behavior is a bit different that what is described from RobotX. For 2018 the instructions are, “Each individual color will appear for 1 second, after which the lights will remain off \(black\) for 2 seconds before repeating the same pattern.” We currently only remain blank for 1 second.

Currently we have a four element pattern array where the first three elements are for the sequence and the fourth element is “off”. Could we add a fifth “blank” element to change our pause to 2 seconds?
content.html:
This is a bit separate from this PR, but in testing I noticed that our light buoy behavior is a bit different that what is described from RobotX. For 2018 the instructions are, “Each individual color will appear for 1 second, after which the lights will remain off (black) for 2 seconds before repeating the same pattern.” We currently only remain blank for 1 second.

Currently we have a four element pattern array where the first three elements are for the sequence and the fourth element is “off”. Could we add a fifth “blank” element to change our pause to 2 seconds?
